plot outline: Kaustuv, a good natured young man finds himself in the good graces of Niladri and Suchismita. They are a young couple, recently moved into a new locality with 7 years old son Rayan. Niladri is particularly fond of him but Suchismita despite using Kaustuv to her benefit, ridicules him at every step. Suchismita's younger sister Nivedita comes from Bangalore on a visit, and soon shapes an interesting dynamics between her and Kaustuv.
title: Akash Choan
plot: The movie '_Akash Choan_ (qv)' is based on Procheto Gupta's short story Nadi.
